snippet.title: Sorcery! 2 for Android official trailer
snippet.description:
An epic fantasy adventure for Android devices and Kindle Fire:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.inkle.sorcery2

Find out more:
http://www.inklestudios.com/sorcery

Sorcery! Part 2 is the sequel to the critically-acclaimed "The Shamutanti Hills". You do NOT need to play Part 1 to enjoy Part 2! Part 2 can be played on its own, or you can continue your adventures from the first game. 

* "Brilliantly artistic" - Gamezebo (5/5)
* "Bigger and better... wonderful for genre fans and novices alike" - Touch Arcade (4.5/5)
* As featured by the Yogscast
* "a gripping and well told story of intrigue and adventure" - 148Apps (4.5/5)
* "Another spectacular rendition of classic interactive fiction" - Kotaku


Enter the town of Kharé: a city of traps and murderers, ruled by a Council of Thieves. Explore the streets of the hand-drawn 3D map, and visit the inns, shrines, crypts, markets and sewers across 12 detailed interior maps. 

Battle weird and ruthless creatures using our unique strategic duelling mechanic. Outwit and deceive the citizens of the city at Swindlestones. Wield powerful magic, with over forty spells to choose from, with powerful, story-changing effects. Unearth the City's turbulent history and find its hidden secrets.

Can you survive The Cityport of Traps?

A fully interactive story with 10,000 choices and over 300,000 words of content, all your decisions shape the adventure you undertake. Our inklewriter technology writes the story in real-time, including procedurally combat sequences and banter with locals. No two games will be quite the same!

Map by Mike Schley (http://mikeschley.com)

Original Illustrations by John Blanche

Like us on Facebook!

http://www.facebook.com/inkleStudios


Follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/inklestudios


Steve Jackson's Sorcery! is an epic solo quest first published by Penguin Books (UK) within the 'Fighting Fantasy' series of adventure gamebooks. Sorcery! was originally published 1983-1999 by Penguin Books (UK). Published 2003-present by Wizard Books, a division of Icon Books (UK).


Fighting Fantasy, created by Steve Jackson & Ian Livingstone, has been the world's most successful series of interactive fantasy adventure gamebooks, published in 27 countries and 22 languages. Over 25 million copies have been sold worldwide.

http://www.fightingfantasy.com


Steve Jackson is a legendary UK games designer, co-founder with Ian Livingstone of Games Workshop and Fighting Fantasy. Jackson also co-founded Lionhead Studios with Peter Molyneux. 


inkle is a Cambridge-based software and design company specialising in interactive stories, founded by former Sony Playstation designers Joseph Humfrey and Jon Ingold. Their previous apps include Frankenstein by Dave Morris and Poems by Heart for Penguin Classics, and their inklewriter website for creating interactive stories is used by schools, game designers and writers.

http://www.inklestudios.com



Text and illustrations copyright © 1983-present Steve Jackson, all rights reserved.
Sorcery! concept and logos are © 1983-present Steve Jackson, all rights reserved.
Digital conversion and code © 2014 inkle Ltd, all rights reserved.
